info.title: Shop
info.description: The Shop resource is a collection of general business and store management settings and information about the store. The resource lets you retrieve information about the store, but it doesn't let you update any information. Only the merchant can update this information from inside the Shopify admin.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

codeSamples.example_code:
test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::Shop.all(
  session: test_session,
)

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::Shop.all(
  session: test_session,
  fields: "address1,address2,city,province,country",
)

properties.description: The shop's street address.
properties.name: address1

properties.description: The optional second line of the shop's street address.
properties.name: address2

properties.description: Whether the shop is capable of accepting payments directly through the Checkout API.
properties.name: checkout_api_supported

properties.description: The shop's city.
properties.name: city

properties.description: The shop's country. In most cases, this value matches the country_code.
properties.name: country

properties.description: The two-letter country code corresponding to the shop's country.
properties.name: country_code

properties.description: The shop's normalized country name.
properties.name: country_name

properties.description: Whether the shop is applying taxes on a per-county basis. Only applicable to shops based in the US. Valid values: true or null."
properties.name: county_taxes

properties.description: The date and time (ISO 8601) when the shop was created.
properties.name: created_at

properties.description: The contact email used for communication between the shop owner and the customer.
properties.name: customer_email

properties.description: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the shop's default currency.
properties.name: currency

properties.description: The shop's domain.
properties.name: domain

properties.description: A list of enabled currencies (ISO 4217 format) that the shop accepts. Merchants can enable currencies from their Shopify Payments settings in the Shopify Admin.
properties.name: enabled_presentment_currencies

properties.description: Whether the shop is eligible to receive a free credit card reader from Shopify.
properties.name: eligible_for_card_reader_giveaway

properties.description: Whether the shop is eligible to use Shopify Payments.
properties.name: eligible_for_payments

properties.description: The contact email used for communication between Shopify and the shop owner.
properties.name: email

properties.description: This field has been deprecated, and is currently unused. Hardcoded to true.
properties.name: finances

properties.description: As of API version 2021-07, this field has been deprecated and is currently unused. Previously indicated whether the shop forced requests made to its resources to be made over SSL using the HTTPS protocol. All requests now use HTTPS, so force_ssl is always true.
properties.name: force_ssl

properties.description: The GSuite URL for the store, if applicable.
properties.name: google_apps_domain

properties.description: Whether the GSuite login is enabled. Shops with this feature will be able to log in through the GSuite login page. Valid values: true, null
properties.name: google_apps_login_enabled

properties.description: Whether any active discounts exist for the shop.
properties.name: has_discounts

properties.description: Whether any active gift cards exist for the shop.
properties.name: has_gift_cards

properties.description: Whether the shop has an online store.
properties.name: has_storefront

properties.description: The name of the timezone assigned by the IANA.
properties.name: iana_timezone

properties.description: The ID for the shop. A 64-bit unsigned integer.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The latitude of the shop's location.
properties.name: latitude

properties.description: The longitude of the shop's location.
properties.name: longitude

properties.description: A string representing the way currency is formatted when the currency isn't specified.
properties.name: money_format

properties.description: A string representing the way currency is formatted in email notifications when the currency isn't specified.
properties.name: money_in_emails_format

properties.description: A string representing the way currency is formatted when the currency is specified.
properties.name: money_with_currency_format

properties.description: A string representing the way currency is formatted in email notifications when the currency is specified.
properties.name: money_with_currency_in_emails_format

properties.description: This field has been deprecated, and is currently unused. Hardcoded to true.
properties.name: multi_location_enabled

properties.description: The shop's .myshopify.com domain.
properties.name: myshopify_domain

properties.description: The name of the shop.
properties.name: name

properties.description: Whether the password protection page is enabled on the shop's online store.
properties.name: password_enabled

properties.description: The contact phone number for the shop.
properties.name: phone

properties.description: The display name of the Shopify plan the shop is on.
properties.name: plan_display_name

properties.description: Whether the pre-launch page is enabled on the shop's online store.
properties.name: pre_launch_enabled

properties.description: The cookie consent level defined on the shop's online store.
properties.name: cookie_consent_level

properties.description: The name of the Shopify plan the shop is on.
properties.name: plan_name

properties.description: The shop's primary locale, as configured in the language settings of the shop's theme.
properties.name: primary_locale

properties.description: Formerly used for the ID of the shipping origin location (read only).
properties.name: primary_location_id

properties.description: The shop's normalized province or state name.
properties.name: province

properties.description: The two- or three-letter code for the shop's province or state.
properties.name: province_code

properties.description: Whether the shop requires an extra Shopify Payments agreement.
properties.name: requires_extra_payments_agreement

properties.description: Whether the shop has any outstanding setup steps.
properties.name: setup_required

properties.description: The username of the shop owner.
properties.name: shop_owner

properties.description: The handle of the partner account that referred the merchant to Shopify, if applicable.
properties.name: source

properties.description: Whether applicable taxes are included in product prices. Valid values: true or null.
properties.name: taxes_included

properties.description: Whether taxes are charged for shipping. Valid values: true or false.
properties.name: tax_shipping

properties.description: The name of the timezone the shop is in.
properties.name: timezone

properties.description: Whether transactional SMS sent by Shopify are disabled on the shop's online store.
properties.name: transactional_sms_disabled

properties.description: The date and time (ISO 8601) when the shop was last updated.
properties.name: updated_at

properties.description: The default unit of weight measurement for the shop.
properties.name: weight_unit

properties.description: The shop's zip or postal code.
properties.name: zip

properties.description: Whether SMS marketing has been enabled on the shop's checkout configuration settings.
properties.name: marketing_sms_consent_enabled_at_checkout

x-shopify-meta.meta_description: Access a store's general settings and information as configured by the merchant in their Shopify admin.
